column2: "Showing them how to deal with them, teaching them how to read the stars... Oh, how nostalgic."
"Earth back then was so brilliant, with people repeatedly evolving and growing."
"But what about now? Aren't you sad when you see this stagnant and unchanging world?"
"The super technology called Ether... Although this was a great opportunity for a shift in evolution, we just used it to extend previous technology."
"No change in mental state, no change in physical state... No, it almost seems like we're devolving."
"This is a very terrible situation. This is an alarming era. Enga, you agree with me, right?"

"I'm sorry, but I don't understand. No, rather, I
don't want to understand."
"Hitsugi, the person he was talking about just now... The legend of King Arthur?"
"You thought so too? Then I didn't hear him wrong..."
"The story about Japan was surely Abe no Seimei, and the rest are various legends from history."
"Oh, Abe no Seimei, right. I remember being called that. Such extensive knowledge from Ms. Hitsugi, as expected of Enga's little sister."
"...Erdem. What the hell are you?"
"I have been called many various names, but I am Ardem Sacred. Leader of Earth Guide and-"
"Haaaaaaaa!!"
"Hng！"
"Tch."
"Good grief."
"It's been a long time, Ives."
"Indeed it has, Ardem."
"How many hundreds of years has it been since we've met face to face?"
"Was it that long ago since we last met?"
"Last time we met, you were very devoted to Alchemy. Did you forget I destroyed your entire workshop?"
"Oh oh! That's right, I forgot about that. How nostalgic... I was \"Paracelsus\" at the time, right?"
"Names don't matter to me. Mine, or yours."
"Good grief, now that Ives is here... There's no way I can convince all of you. I guess it can't be helped. Ophiel, let's go."
"Certainly, Sir Ardem."
"A portal?! Ardem, what are you doing?!"
"A foolish question, Enga. As I said, the Earth is stagnant."
"If the people of Earth cannot be trusted to evolve, and don't choose that path... Then I will choose it for them."
"Guiding the Earth and carving a new history... That's the purpose of Earth Guide."
"Wait!"
"Guiding the Earth and leading our evolution...? Are you trying to play God?! Ardem!"
"I... wasn't helping you for this... Not for this bullshit!"
"Long Long Lone"
"母なる願い"
